question.title: Having issues where Java StreamingResponseBody is null
question.body:
Does anyone see any issues with the below code? I'm experiencing issues where the StreamingResponseBody returned by this method is null and no content is returned in the ResponseEntity body of the controller method which uses this. I recently upgraded my SpringBoot version to 3.4.4 and now all a sudden the code below doesn't seem to be working to stream content.

public StreamingResponseBody retrieveFileBytesStreamingResponse(String fileId) {
        return outputStream -> {
            transactionTemplate.executeWithoutResult(action -> {
                try (InputStream inputStream = retrieveFileBytes(fileId)) {
                    StreamUtils.copy(inputStream, outputStream);
                } catch (IOException e) {
                    throw new PersistenceException(e);
                }
            });
        };
    }
